==============================================
A scalable server for realtime apps
----------------------------------------------
Deepstream is a clusterable server that provides everything necessary to build powerful realtime applications. Itâ€™s written in nodeJs and freely available under a MIT license. To learn more, please visit http://deepstream.io/

## Documentation

For API documentation see the [documentation page](http://deepstream.io/docs/)!

For tutorials and plugins see the [tutorial page](http://deepstream.io/tutorials/)!
